title: Fuck you riot for making us cheese bots
body:
You cant even program a bot better than other mobas, you should be ashamed.

I shouldnt have to cheese a fucking brand forever or get hit by his perfect aim on his AoE ability. Not to mention you give bots as much damage as you do in normal games so getting cc'd unless your one of those meta champions means they can perfectly land everything on you unless you flash or SOMEHOW randomly dodge their ability.

Watching your game go down and people defending you only pleases me more. I cant wait to spit on your game with the millions of other players you screwed over these past 3 years.
